==========================================================
Vercel 环境变量配置 - 快速复制版
==========================================================

📋 共13个环境变量，请在Vercel Dashboard中逐个添加：
Settings → Environment Variables → Add

每个变量都要选择环境: Production, Preview, Development (全选)

==========================================================

变量 1/13
---
Name: IMAGE_API_BASE_URL
Value: https://jeniya.top/v1/images/generations

变量 2/13
---
Name: IMAGE_MODEL_NAME
Value: doubao-seedream-4-0-250828

变量 3/13
---
Name: IMAGE_API_KEY
Value: sk-qNMLqt90BOryg38Ey21HI4QWQl2SObYybMli28qginQolPaE

变量 4/13
---
Name: PRODUCT_IMAGE_API_BASE_URL
Value: https://jeniya.top/v1/images/generations

变量 5/13
---
Name: PRODUCT_IMAGE_MODEL_NAME
Value: gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview

变量 6/13
---
Name: PRODUCT_IMAGE_API_KEY
Value: sk-AHP64E0ntf5VEltYLSV17wTLYeV4WZ3ucJzf72u0UHXf0Hos

变量 7/13
---
Name: PRODUCT_REFINE_API_BASE_URL
Value: http://jeniya.top/v1beta/models/gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview:generateContent

变量 8/13
---
Name: PRODUCT_REFINE_MODEL_NAME
Value: gemini-2.5-flash-lite

变量 9/13
---
Name: PRODUCT_REFINE_API_KEY
Value: sk-AHP64E0ntf5VEltYLSV17wTLYeV4WZ3ucJzf72u0UHXf0Hos

变量 10/13
---
Name: CHAT_API_BASE_URL
Value: https://jeniya.top/v1/chat/completions

变量 11/13
---
Name: CHAT_MODEL_NAME
Value: gemini-2.5-flash-lite

变量 12/13
---
Name: CHAT_API_KEY
Value: sk-AHP64E0ntf5VEltYLSV17wTLYeV4WZ3ucJzf72u0UHXf0Hos

变量 13/13
---
Name: STORAGE_ROOT
Value: ./.uploads

==========================================================
✅ 添加完成后，点击 "Redeploy" 重新部署！
==========================================================

功能对应关系：
- F1 单品图换背景 → PRODUCT_IMAGE_*
- F2 Logo设计 → IMAGE_* + CHAT_*
- F3 门头招牌 → IMAGE_*
- F4 图片墙 → IMAGE_*
- F5 产品精修 → PRODUCT_REFINE_*
- F6 食物替换 → PRODUCT_REFINE_*
- F7 背景融合 → PRODUCT_REFINE_*
- F8 多图融合 → PRODUCT_REFINE_*

⚠️ 安全提示：
- API_KEY是敏感信息，请妥善保管
- 定期更换API密钥
- 不要公开分享密钥

📖 详细说明请查看: .github/ENV_VARIABLES_GUIDE.md
